content.raw:
I agree, seems like a valid bug to me.

I’ve imported this patch in top of the current `gazebo10` branch:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1792)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-homebrew-amd64/1792/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1792/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2631)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2631/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2631/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=37)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/37/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/37/))



Don’t see any new failure. Thanks Jonathan for the patch.
content.html:
I agree, seems like a valid bug to me.

I’ve imported this patch in top of the current gazebo10 branch:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1792/)

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2631/)

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/37/)

Don’t see any new failure. Thanks Jonathan for the patch.
